name: Từ vựng Tiếng Anh Người tham gia thể thao (People in Sports)

words.example: The player scored a goal in the last minute.
She is a talented athlete who competes in many sports.
The coach motivated his team to work harder.
The referee blew the whistle to signal a foul.
Our team worked together to win the championship.
The fans cheered loudly for their favorite player.
Many spectators gathered to watch the exciting match.
